text: Lipton To Go Stix Iced Gren Tea Mix, Tea and Honey, Mango Pineapple is a very refreshing drink on a hot day. These are very easy to use, just mix one stix with a 16.9 fl oz bottled water and you have a very refreshing drink. Lipton has provided high quality teas for many years and these fit in quite well with Lipton products. The crystals dissolve very quickly and had just the right amount of honey Mango and Pineapple for a very tasty and refreshing drink.
